title: Microsoft Power BI Report Performance Analyzer Export Schema

events.description: Events captured by the performance analyzer.

items.description: Represents an operation that occurred while updating a visual.

id.description: The unique identifier for this event.

parentId.description: The id of this event's parent event.  This must match the id of some other event in this document.  Omitted for root events.

name.description: Together with 'component', 'name' identifies the kind of event that occurred.

component.description: The subsystem that performed the operation represented by this event.

start.description: The timestamp when the event started.

end.description: The timestamp when the event ended.  Omitted for events that represent an instantaneous operation.

metrics.description: A property bag of additional information about this event.  The content varies for each kind of event.
